Leah hires a non-Jewish cook for a small catered dinner at her home. Leah turns on the gas stove and lights the flame for a pot of raw potatoes and onions (not typically eaten raw) in water. She then steps away. The cook (a) lowers the flame to a simmer, (b) later turns the burner fully off because it is boiling over, and (c) ten minutes later turns the same burner back on and finishes the cooking until fully edible.

Assume that when the burner was turned off, the potatoes were still less than 1/3 cooked (not yet ma'achal ben Derusai).

- dish_if_leah_stirs_once_near_end_while_still_cooking: one of ["bishul_yisrael", "bishul_akum"]
